messages.content: You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Tell me about the World Cup winner in Spain 1982.
The winner of the 1982 FIFA World Cup held in Spain was Italy. They defeated West Germany 3-1 in the final match.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
What about Mexico 1986?
The 1986 FIFA World Cup in Mexico was won by Argentina. They beat West Germany 3-2 in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Who won in Italy 1990?
West Germany won the 1990 World Cup in Italy. They defeated Argentina 1-0 in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
What about USA 1994?
Brazil won the 1994 World Cup held in the USA. They defeated Italy in a penalty shootout after a 0-0 draw in the final match.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Tell me about France 1998.
France won the 1998 World Cup held in their home country. They defeated Brazil 3-0 in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
What happened in Korea-Japan 2002?
Brazil won the 2002 World Cup held in South Korea and Japan. They defeated Germany 2-0 in the final match.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Who won in Germany 2006?
Italy won the 2006 World Cup held in Germany. They defeated France in a penalty shootout after a 1-1 draw in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Tell me about South Africa 2010.
Spain won the 2010 World Cup held in South Africa. They defeated the Netherlands 1-0 in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Who won in Brazil 2014?
Germany won the 2014 World Cup held in Brazil. They defeated Argentina 1-0 in the final.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
What about Russia 2018?
France won the 2018 World Cup held in Russia. They defeated Croatia 4-2 in the final match.
You are a helpful assistant specializing in World Cup history.
Tell me about Qatar 2022.
I don't know
